key_features: Additional 10% off during selected sale events at Takashimaya Department Store. Redeem S$30 worth of Takashimaya Gift Vouchers with every 100 Takashimaya Bonus Points.
Enjoy S$4 top-up to your CashCard for parking when you charge at least S$400 to your Card at Takashimaya Department Store.
6% voucher rebates in Takashimaya Department Store (Earn 2 Takashimaya Bonus Points1 with every S$10 charged)
2% voucher rebates in Takashimaya Shopping Centre (Earn 2 Takashimaya Bonus Points2 with every S$30 charged)

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
